name: GovernmentOfTheRepublicOfPeru
definition: unitary presidential constitutional republic and representative democracy, whose president is both head of state and head of government
label: Government of the Republic of Peru

name: GovernmentOfTheRepublicOfSuriname
definition: unitary republic and representative democracy, whose president is both head of state and head of government
label: Republiek Suriname

name: UruguayanEntity
label: Uruguayan entity
definition: sovereign state and polity that is located in the southeastern region of South America, bordered by Argentina to its west and southwest and Brazil to its north and east, with the Rio de la Plata (River of Silver) to the south and the Atlantic Ocean to the southeast

name: VenezuelanEntity
definition: sovereign state and polity that is located on the northern coast of South America, consisting of a continental landmass and many small islands and islets in the Caribbean Sea
label: Venezuelan entity

name: GovernmentOfTheCo-operativeRepublicOfGuyana
label: Government of the Co-operative Republic of Guyana
definition: unitary presidential constitutional republic and representative democracy, whose president is both head of state and head of government

name: GovernmentOfTheRepublicOfParaguay
label: Government of the Republic of Paraguay
definition: unitary dominant-party presidential republic and representative democracy, whose president is both head of state and head of government

name: JurisdictionOfSuriname
label: jurisdiction of Suriname
definition: jurisdiction of the judiciary of Suriname, which is the system of courts, headed by the High Court of Justice of Suriname (Supreme Court), that interprets and applies the law in Suriname

name: GovernmentOfThePlurinationalStateOfBolivia
label: Estado Plurinacional de Bolivia
definition: Unitary presidential constitutional republic and representative democracy whose president is both head of state and head of government

name: JurisdictionOfColombia
definition: jurisdiction of the judiciary of Colombia, which is the system of courts, including the Supreme Court which deals with penal and civil matters, the Council of State, which has special responsibility for administrative law and also provides legal advice to the executive, the Constitutional Court, responsible for assuring the integrity of the Colombian constitution, and the Superior Council of Judicature, responsible for auditing the judicial branch, that interprets and applies the law in Colombia
label: jurisdiction of Colombia

name: ColombianEntity
definition: sovereign state and polity that is a transcontinental country largely in the north of South America, bounded on the north by the Caribbean Sea, the northwest by Panama, the south by Ecuador and Peru, the east by Venezuela, the southeast by Brazil, and the west by the Pacific Ocean
label: Colombian entity

name: GovernmentOfTheOrientalRepublicOfUruguay
label: Government of the Oriental Republic of Uruguay
definition: unitary presidential constitutional republic and representative democracy, whose president is both head of state and head of government

name: JurisdictionOfUruguay
definition: jurisdiction of the judiciary of Uruguay, which is the system of courts, including the Supreme Court, the bench and judges, that interprets and applies the law in Uruguay
label: jurisdiction of Uruguay

name: GovernmentOfTheBolivarianRepublicOfVenezuela
label: República Bolivariana de Venezuela
definition: federal dominant-party presidential constitutional republic, whose president is both head of state and head of government

name: ArgentinianEntity
definition: federated sovereignty and polity that is located in the southern half of South America, bordered by Bolivia and Paraguay to the north, Brazil to the northeast, Uruguay and the South Atlantic Ocean to the east, and the Drake Passage to the south
label: Argentinian entity

name: GovernmentOfTheRepublicOfChile
definition: unitary presidential constitutional republic and representative democracy, whose president is both head of state and head of government
label: República de Chile

name: SurinameseEntity
definition: sovereign state and polity that is located on the northeastern Atlantic coast of South America, bordered by the Atlantic Ocean to the north, French Guiana to the east, Guyana to the west and Brazil to the south
label: Surinamese entity

name: GuyaneseEntity
label: Guyanese entity
definition: sovereign state and polity that is bordered by the Atlantic Ocean to the north, Brazil to the south and southwest, Venezuela to the west, and Suriname to the east

name: BrazilianEntity
label: Brazilian entity
definition: federated sovereignty and polity that is the largest country in both South America and Latin America

name: JurisdictionOfPeru
label: jurisdiction of Peru
definition: jurisdiction of the judiciary of Peru, which is the system of courts, including the Supreme Court of Peru, also known as the Royal Audencia of Lima, that interprets and applies the law in Peru

name: JurisdictionOfParaguay
label: jurisdiction of Paraguay
definition: jurisdiction of the judiciary of Paraguay, which is the system of courts, including tribunals and Courts of Civil Law and a nine-member Supreme Court of Justice, that interprets and applies the law in Paraguay

name: ChileanEntity
label: Chilean entity
definition: sovereign state and polity that occupies a long, narrow strip of land between the Andes to the east and the Pacific Ocean to the west, and borders Peru to the north, Bolivia to the northeast, Argentina to the east, and the Drake Passage in the far south

name: EcuadorianEntity
label: Ecuadorian entity
definition: sovereign state and polity that is located in northwestern South America, bordered by Colombia on the north, Peru on the east and south, and the Pacific Ocean on the west

name: GovernmentOfTheArgentineRepublic
label: República Argentina
definition: federal presidential constitutional republic and representative democracy whose president is both head of state and head of government

name: JurisdictionOfVenezuela
definition: jurisdiction of the judiciary of Venezuela, which is the system of courts, including the Venezuelan Supreme Court, that interprets and applies the law in Venezuela
label: jurisdiction of Venezuela

name: ParaguayanEntity
label: Paraguayan entity
definition: sovereign state and polity that is bordered by Argentina to the south and southwest, Brazil to the east and northeast, and Bolivia to the northwest

name: BolivianEntity
label: Bolivian entity
definition: sovereign state and polity that is a landlocked country located in western-central South America

name: JurisdictionOfGuyana
label: jurisdiction of Guyana
definition: jurisdiction of the judiciary of Guyana, which is the system of courts, including the Supreme Court of Guyana, that interprets and applies the law in Guyana

name: GovernmentOfTheRepublicOfEcuador
label: Government of the Republic of Ecuador
definition: unitary presidential constitutional republic and representative democracy, whose president is both head of state and head of government

name: JurisdictionOfChile
label: jurisdiction of Chile
definition: jurisdiction of the judiciary of Chile, which is the system of courts, including a court of appeal, a system of military courts, a constitutional tribunal, and the Supreme Court of Chile, that interprets and applies the law in Chile

name: GovernmentOfTheRepublicOfColombia
definition: unitary presidential constitutional republic and representative democracy, whose president is both head of state and head of government
label: Government of the Republic of Colombia

name: JurisdictionOfEcuador
definition: jurisdiction of the judiciary of Ecuador, which is the system of courts, including as its main body the Judicial Council, and also includes the National Court of Justice, provincial courts, and lower courts, that interprets and applies the law in Ecuador
label: jurisdiction of Ecuador

name: JurisdictionOfBolivia
label: jurisdiction of Bolivia
definition: jurisdiction of the judiciary of Bolivia, including the Supreme Court of Justice, the Plurinational Constitutional Court, the Judiciary Council, Agrarian and Environmental Court, and District (departmental) and lower courts that interpret and apply the law in Bolivia

name: GovernmentOfTheFederativeRepublicOfBrazil
label: República Federativa do Brasil
definition: democratic federative republic, with a presidential system, whose president is both head of state and head of government

name: PeruvianEntity
definition: sovereign state and polity that is bordered in the north by Ecuador and Colombia, in the east by Brazil, in the southeast by Bolivia, in the south by Chile, and in the west by the Pacific Ocean
label: Peruvian entity

name: JurisdictionOfArgentina
label: jurisdiction of Argentina
definition: jurisdiction of the judiciary of Argentina, which is the system of courts, including the Supreme Court and lower federal courts, that interprets and applies the law in Argentina

name: JurisdictionOfBrazil
label: jurisdiction of Brazil
definition: jurisdiction of the judiciary of Brazil, which is the system of courts, including the Federal Supreme Court and Federal District Courts, that interprets and applies the law in Brazil
